Text: Defeat Ran'jit!
Defeat Ran'jit!
Evade Ran'jit using Perfect Deception!
Fire a round from your gunblade!
Bide your time for a chance to strike!
Evade Ran'jit using Perfect Deception!
Fire another round from your gunblade!
Bide your time for a chance to strike!
Evade Ran'jit using Perfect Deception!
Endure Ran'jit's onslaught!
Evade Ran'jit using Souldeep Invisibility!
Fire your last cartridge!
Whatever it takes, I swear I will end you.
Hmph. You lie to yourself as you lied to her.
Aye, I lied. Kept secrets. But no more. She deserves better.
A life of pain? Of ceaseless conflict and despair?
This is going well...
Vanity...
Beast of my blood, answer my call!
Rend my foes and ward their blows.
Hah, so you really are a monster.
Better a monster than a deceiver. A spinner of foolish dreams and false hopes.
There is no folly in hope!
...I said as much myself, once. I was wrong. Never again.
Dammit! I need time to line up a clean shot.
I suppose if there's no other way...
When will you learn?
When you're dead and buried!
Not good...
The strain is more than I remember... At least now I can get that shot.
You would court death for mere parlor tricks?
\\<pant> \\<pant> ...My life would be but a small price to pay.
You never understood her.
She is not a bird to be locked away in a gilded cage.
And you presume to be her protector. Pathetic!
Looks like I'll have to use it again, then.
Urgh... Hold still, damn you!
No quarter!
You have played your hand far too early, boy.
This has carried on long enough, wouldn't you agree?
Why do you persist in this folly?
Is that all?
Minfilia's last cartridge... Have to... \\<pant> \\<pant> ...make it count...
There you are!
Gah! But how!?
Fools to a man!
I'd hoped you would fall for it a third time...
Urgh... Though two times was... \\<pant> \\<pant> ...perhaps already too many...
No more tricks? Then let us finish this.
But you've not even seen the grand finale.
One...last...disappearing act...
Were you not struggling to stand I might think you serious.
Oh, I am deadly serious.
Fool! You think the shadows will save you?
There is no escape! Do you hear me!?
To hell with you!!!
Thank you, Minfilia...for this precious gift...
Come on, old boy... \\<pant> ...One more shot...
Yield now and I will grant you a quick death.
But we've only just begun.
Then pay it you shall!
Rise, oceans! Swallow this forsaken land!
All shall crumble before me!
Surge, tides! Crush, waves! Let none be spared.
Your corse shall feed the vortex!
Too stubborn to accept your fate, too blind to see you are doomed!
Power...such power...mine for the taking!
None shall defy me!
Everything...is mine to consume!
I will not cease until the ocean covers every ilm of this star!
Now, the sea shall swallow all!
<split(<String>ObjectParameter(1)</String>, ,1)>! I'll use Eden's power!
This should hold for now, but be careful!
Not again! Hold on, I'll try to rebuild it!
That's it, Eden!
Defeat Leviathan
Relive Renda-Rae's battle against Balam-Quitz!
Balam-Quitz! Vengeance will be mine this day!
Just wait until I hit you with one of my dulling arrows...
It worked! I've got you now, you bastard...
Gah, my ears! Need to use the arrows...
All I need is one good shot with a dulling arrow...
Godsdammit, what is wrong with you? Use the arrows...
Ugh... Need to hit him with a dulling arrow before he roars...
You'll pay for taking them from me!
It was my fault. My failure. That's why I have to do it alone...
If I'd only been this strong back then, they'd still be alive...
You can feel it, can't you!? The pain, the fear! Serves you right!
What the─ Where is this coming from!?
Gah! I won't let it end like this!
We won't! Godsdammit, Renda...
Made it in the nick, I see.
Are you hurt!? Don't worry, I've got you...
The lone wolf just had to do it on her own terms...
Aye, well, I was never good at indulging foolishness.
Don't...don't tell me you followed my trail?
I'll tell you all about it after we kill this bloody bastard, aye?
It's coming for me and Renda! Keep your distance!
Gather round Nyelbert! Lend him your strength!
Gonna roar again, huh? The hells you will!
I've got plenty arrows left for you yet!
Gah... Too late...
Steady, Renda! We'll best this bastard yet!
No one's dying on my watch!
Take that, you bastard!
Well struck! Keep it up!
Focus, everyone!
Renda, Nyelbert! Assist Lamitt, quickly!
It's summoning all its strength for something big. Finish it!
Everyone, to me! I'll lend you my power!
Together we will avenge my fallen friends!
Something's wrong! It's shrugging off our attacks!
Without your roar you're nothing!
Calm down. Trust the arrows. Shut its bloody gob...
Grr... Need to hit it with a dulling arrow...
The arrows...use the arrows. It's the only way...
Gotta hit it with a dulling arrow before it roars again...
Yes, yes! Just like that!
Like I'll let you roar again! I've got plenty of arrows left!
You are destined for naught else but oblivion!
I am stifled by this vessel of flesh...
Behold, a sorcerer of eld! Tremble before my glory!
My dormant brethren, dream now of a dark tomorrow...
By our gathered might must we reclaim these vain reflections.
In Zodiark's name, I beseech you!
Has the Wardens' Light won free!? No...
Damn you... Damn your wretched blessing!
That Light split the world, and every life upon it!
Our tragedy must never again come to pass!
By His grace will Darkness reign over all!
Death comes for Her servants...
I shall rebuild our kingdom upon your bones.
The future of this star shall be shaped by my hands!
I shall be raised up by the prayers of my fallen brethren!
I am unbound by cosmic law!
Hearken to the word of ruin!
This place will be your tomb!
Begone!
Darkness, flow through me!
Abomination! You seek to shatter my soul?
The arcane is mine to command!
Flee, you fools!
Darkness reigns!
Drown in despair!
Unburden your sleeping souls, my brethren...
I shall bear every hope, every dream, every prayer!
I will extinguish the spark of your miserable lives!
Give voice to your anguish, my brethren!
Give substance to our hopes, our dreams, our prayers...
And by their undeniable grace, may our perfect world rise anew!
Yawn wide, the ever-hungering void!
Devour the Light, and return all to Darkness!
Impressive resilience... But it matters little. I have all eternity to break your stubborn wills!
From the heart of a mountain, I rise.
Tempered in the flows of the mountain's core, my rage is eternal!
There is no salvation for the sons of man.
I shall grind you to dust, mortal!
I am unbreakable, unstoppable!
Bow down, overdweller!
Now you too shall go the way of all the earth.
Embrace your fate!

Frail, foolish creature.
You are nothing!
Your tomb awaits!
Your fleeting, meaningless existence ends here.
Defeat Titan
My fury erupts forth!
Now, the earth will claim you.
Your soul is doomed to everlasting torment!
Defeat Eden Prime
Show me your “vaunted” strength. And I shall expose the lie of your fragmented existence!
The arcane is mine to command!
Flee, you fools!
Darkness reigns!
You are no match for my mastery of the arcane!
Pitiful, malformed, wretched creatures!
Your call for aid beyond this world will avail you naught!
My brethren are legion!
Let shadows form from my will alone!
Come, Nabriales!
Emerge, Lahabrea! Rise, Igeyorhm!
Our plea transcends the very boundaries of the soul!
Your meager convictions will crumble before our might!
Unburden your sleeping souls, my brethren...
I shall bear every hope, every dream, every prayer!
Behold, a sorcerer of eld! Tremble before my glory!
The future of this star shall be shaped by my hands!
Remember, my brethren!
Yearn, my brethren!
My brethren! Let our will be as one!
I am unbound by cosmic law!
Hearken to the word of ruin!
Begone!
Darkness, flow through me!
Drown in despair!
My dormant brethren, dream now of a dark tomorrow...
By our gathered might must we reclaim these vain reflections.
In Zodiark's name, I beseech you!
Has the Wardens' Light won free!? No...
Damn you... Damn your wretched blessing!
No... This is not the end...
We are the blessed! We are the chosen!
Let the darkness consume you!
This star is ours, and ours alone! We will not relinquish it to the likes of you!
Be scattered and strewn like dust!
For you, who never should have been, this is the end!
That Light split the world, and every life upon it!
Our tragedy must never again come to pass!
By His grace will Darkness reign over all!
Death comes for Her servants...
I shall rebuild our kingdom upon your bones.
Abomination! You seek to shatter my soul?
I shall be raised up by the prayers of my fallen brethren!
Unworthy wretches... I consign you to the darkness!
Farewell, pitiful creatures!
Tremble and fall to the ground before me!
Let fire and ice cleanse you of your mortal turpitude!
At last, you are one! Let the profundity of your soul crush all who would defy us!
Arrive at the Martial Court
Clear the Martial Court
Arrive at the Font of Quintessence
Clear the Font of Quintessence
Arrive at the Chamber of Celestial Song

我が宮殿に、客を招いた覚えはないぞ！
立ち去らぬというなら……！
Come, my lovelies! There is filth that wants for cleaning!
Such pernicious stains, you are. No matter...
Ugh! Insufferable, the lot of you. I will spare you, but only this once. Now leave me be!
Krow ot emit! Swish-swish-aroo!
Ssem a tahw, ssem a tahw! Swish-swish-aroo!
Come, then, little ones. Let me show you the delights of my garden.
The time has come to play, my children. Hearken to my melody.
Grow, my children, grow! Show them the glory of your splendor!
I shall...bloom...again...
Go, Lugus. Turn them to ash. I care not how.
Yes, set them alight with your undying flames. Burn bright until they are naught but cinders!
Defeat Lugus
From ageless sleep, I bid thee rise!
Bring unto them a swift demise!
I call forth blades to run them through!
Brave knights of eld, tried-and-true.
With wings of dreams, I bar thy path.
I conjure forth the garden's wrath.
Hold them fast with thorn and vine.
To death's embrace their souls consign.
I summon thee from flesh of stone.
Seize the intruders who besmirch thy hall!
しまった……シャンデリアが……！？
Should you value your lives, you will quit this place at once. Now, begone with you!
Look how they make a mess of my floors! Swish and flick, my lovelies. Swish and flick!
If you insist on making a mess of my palace, then you leave me no choice...
Still you press onward? How foolish.
Leannan sith! These cretins have sullied the sanctity of your garden. They must be dealt with!
The garden is ruined. Ruined! Mark my words─you will pay for this!
With wings of dreams to grind their bones.
Why do you persist? Why will you not leave me be!?
And by King's judgment see them fall.
I see you cannot be dissuaded from your misguided path. A pity...
Knights immortal, heed my call!
Clear warehouse A
Clear warehouse B
Clear quality assurance
Clear warehouse C
Clear the forward deck
Clear the rear deck
What is that awful noise?
The alarm. They know we're here.
“They”?
The machine lifeforms. As you see.
Machines don't have “life,” though. That's an oxymoron.
They have sentience; they have will. Though these ones' will is not their own...
Intruders detected. Purge protocol initialized.
Multiple lifeforms confirmed. Eliminating.
All units: fire at will.
We're surrounded! Watch your back. And your front.
All units: sight primary targets.
Don't let them get a lock on you! Keep moving!
All units: ready detonators.
They're coming from above! Get clear!
All units: ready lasers.
These energy readings... Move!
All units: expend energy reserves.
Alert. Alert. Preliminary defen...ses...breach...
I appreciate your assistance.
Awfully clever of us to bring help along.
Stay close.
Fancy meeting you here, yawning chasm.
We'll need to take the pods across.
What, these tiny things? You sure?
The small ones are easy enough to deal with. Most of the time...
Reinforcements. Take them out.
Good enough. Let's go.
I can't believe that this─whatever it is─has been here all along...
It's a factory for the machine lifeforms. And an active threat.
This way.
Volunteers detected and welcomed. Commencing assessment.
Something isn't right here. It's almost like...
Sacrifice for the greater good logged and appreciated.
It's above us. And below. And... Dammit.
Subject finesse duly noted as “inspirational.” Congratulations!
Initial testing complete. Commencing pain tolerance assessment.
The walls! Keep your eyes on the walls!
New durability records logged. Congratulations!
Commencing logic circuit and processing speed assessment.
Results far exceeding projections logged. Subjects confirmed irregular.
I assume these tests are only designed for machine lifeforms.
Potential score manipulation detected. Offense taken.
Evaluation suspended. Discarding subjects.
As I thought. We'll need to destroy it quickly.
Subject persistence duly noted as “irritating.”
Further manipulation detected. Offense heightened.
Alert: Subjects advised that failure to follow instructions will be punished.
High Alert: Subjects advised that failure to be punished will be punished.
Danger: Subjects advised to die faster.
Flagrant disrespect for science detected. “How dare you?” queried.
How...dare...you...
Anomaly...dete...cted...commend...re...pair...
We can descend via the central hatch.
Some may still be functional. Be careful.
How are all of these machines powered?
Each of them has a core. Destroy that, and it can't function.
Look! What's that?
A flight unit. This should speed things up.
It's been hacked!
I've taken control. This way.
Goliath-class machines ahead. Prepare yourselves.
My name is Engels, serial number 110-C.
Those arms are nasty. Keep your distance.
Now charging. Please wait.
Support units. Nothing a few missiles won't solve.
I suppose we'll do this the hard way.
Now annihilating. Please wait.
Vital signs detected. Reevaluating offensive protocol...
Dammit! Scanning for energy signature...
There, below. It's rising fast.
Prepare for breach!
Vital signs detected. Reevaluating offensive protocol...
Incendiary readied. Remain still while crushing commences.
Do something about those arms!
Support required. Activating Marx units.
More units? What now?
Critical da...mage...sustai...ned. Please...wait... Please...
This energy signature... Found you!
Oh, fly off and leave us to clamber over the giant scary machine, why don't you.
Not these again... But I suppose there's no time to waste.
So you're with 2P? Don't think I won't kill you too.
You're the one who's going to die here, 9S.
These Goliaths sure are handy!
He's hacking Engels. Arm incoming!
Targets acquired. Firing at will!
Tank controls online!
Destroy the tanks! He's drawing power from them.
Fine, fine. Self-destruct it is!
Find cover, fast!
Just try dodging this.
He's taking control of the missiles!
I'll blow you to pieces!
I'll shield you. Over here!
You're not getting out alive, 2P!
Decoupling flight unit. And now...
Don't let him out of your sight!
Here goes!
And again.
Die already!
Multiple heat signatures from 9S's unit. Get back!
He's coming back this way!
If we hit the unit hard enough, we might be able to disrupt his connection.
What is this stuff? Flour?
Mineral dust, maybe. I hope it's not harmful.
\\<cough> \\<cough> ...Particularly as I just breathed some in.

<sheet(PlaceName,IntegerParameter(1),0)>
<switch(IntegerParameter(2),Rank B,Rank A,Rank S)>
<switch(IntegerParameter(3),Activating in: <Num>IntegerParameter(4)</Num>:<Sec>IntegerParameter(5)</Sec>,Active,Claimed <Icon>51</Icon>,Claimed <Icon>52</Icon>,Claimed <Icon>53</Icon>)>
Escape the imperial palace
Defeat Arch Ultima
Alert! Alert! Intruders detected in the Imperial Way! All available units, converge!
We must leave this place, now! Before they can gather reinforcements!
Don't let them get away!
Damnit, they're already here.
It seems there is no turning back. We must force our way through.
The Black Wolf is among the intruders! Deploy magitek armor!
There they are! Stop them!
Let's keep moving.
Ugh, there is no end to them...
You won't escape, Gaius Baelsar!
You will pay for your crimes, traitor!
I was wondering when the imperial guard would appear... Focus on the magitek armor first!
Annia─on my mark!
I think not!
Damn it...
This way. Quickly!
We make ourselves easy marks by moving together. I suggest we split up.
All right, then. I'll take the low road, so to speak.
I will see you outside. Stay safe.

It seems we've been afforded an impromptu field test.
Ready all battle data, and begin test sequence 2.0!

Initiating synthetic auracite system...
All systems now fully functional!
We haven't much time! I said ready the battle data, damn you!
Now loading data sample XIV...
It's not working! Ready another sample─the one taken from Castrum Abania!
Now loading data sample XII...
Increase generator output to maximum! Activate the magitek field─full power!
Unstoppable? We shall see about that.
Nidhogg! Show them your fury!
This...cannot be...
If you would bar my way, then you will feel the fury of Nidhogg!
It works, it works! Hahaha! Arch Ultima is unstoppable!
Purge Lyhe Mheg of nightmares!
Vanquish An Lad's nightmare!
To think that all of this came from An Lad's heart...
Come on, we have to hurry and find them!
This mist... It's a nightmare that plagued one of the children!
We'll take care of it just like always. Ezel─do your thing!
Very well! <split(<String>ObjectParameter(1)</String>, ,1)>─at your command, I will suck it up and spit it out yonder for smiting!
Right, time for my magick! Get ready, <split(<String>ObjectParameter(1)</String>, ,1)>!
This gloomy aura... Over there! It's An Lad!
Another nightmare! <split(<String>ObjectParameter(1)</String>, ,1)>─I await your command!
I'll make short work of this! \\<snort>
There's another one just over there! Come on!
Now, where did An Lad disappear to?
Uhhh, this burning sensation... It's the nightmare from Rak'tika!
Careful, <split(<String>ObjectParameter(1)</String>, ,1)>! This fiend is stronger than the ones before!
Ah, there's An Lad! Come on!
Another nightmare! Let's be quick about it!
Can't be many nightmares left, now... Ah! Up the slope!
Hold on, An Lad! We're coming for you!
I can't take it anymore... I just want to disappear...
Oh, no you don't! Don't you dare disappear on me!
I've never devoured anything near as potent... But whatever may become of my belly, I will do this! I must!
